name: Die die and die again
description:
A coursework for COMP3218 for University of Southampton. The game features a square which needs to use death as a tool to navigate to the end of scene. Dead corpses from previous iterations would remain changing the landscape allowing new paths of navigation or reaching the finish line.

Credits

This game was developed by Anan and myself

Controls:

ad or left and right arrow keys-move left and right.

space bar-Jump

ctrl-die and leave behind a block at your site of death

m-map, you can use wasd or arrow keys to navigate while in map mode to see the full map.
